sentences.sContent: In the latter case, buyers pay a 15% commission.
sentences.sCn: 在后一种情况下，买家付15%的佣金。

sentences.sContent: ...it is more reasonable to support the former opinion rather than the latter one...
...the latter of which is a great appeal to the young generation...

synos.tran: 后者的；近来的；后面的；较后的

trans.tranOther: being the second of two people or things, or the last in a list just mentioned
